page.title: 07Lyneal-cum-Colemere Church
page.content: The incumbent,Rev.J.Durnell,is rector of 4 churches: Lyneal,Cockshutt, Welshampton, Petton. There is a service every Sunday:lst l0.00am 2nd 2.30pm 3rd l0.00am 4th ll.00am.No hymns are sung at l0.00am service. 2.30pm is evensong. Harvest Festival, at 6.30pm, is attended by Colemere Sailing Club (lessons read by members.) A carol service with nativity play is held for Lyneal school children and parents annually. Flowers are arranged and brasses cleaned each week and the churchyard grass is cut fortnightly on a rota basis. Our parish share and expenses are some Â£l500. We raise this through events and weekly collections. We have long-eared bats in the church. The organist is Mr. G. Rook.
